page.title: 09Employment
page.content: We have very little industry in Childs Ercall but we do have some old war hangers which are used for storage . They store{wood shavings}which are used for animal bedding and sawdust which is also used for animal bedding .They store milk powder and milk products,{packing cases, machinery, rubber and empty tins and jars. Another hanger is used by a local farmer for potatoes untill they are needed at the shops.On another site there are 3 hangers one of which is used by a potatoes merchant for the storage, sorting and bagging of potatoes for the wholesale market. Eaton hangers store{Maxell tapes}from {Telford ,}and{link 51}which makes storage racking also come from Telford . Bibbys come from Shrewsbury and store animal food and corn in three hangers.
